docs.text:
V-Sim



  

  

    

  

  

    

  

  

    

  

  





V-Sim is a 
RISC-V
 assembler and runtime simulator for educational purposes made in Java. Almost all the 32-bit base integer instruction set can be simulated, as well as the 
M
 and 
F
 extensions.




Installation


To install or update V-Sim, you can use the installation script.


with 
cURL
:


curl https://git.io/fbpu0 -L -o vsim && chmod +x vsim && . ./vsim && rm vsim




or 
Wget
:


wget -O vsim https://git.io/fbpu0 && chmod +x vsim && . ./vsim && rm vsim




To verify that V-Sim has been installed, do:


vsim -version




which should output 
vsim-v1.0.0
 if the installation was successful.
